name: MegaChug
description:
♫ What drink is better than getting a hug? You better: Glug! That! Mega Chug! ♫

Pretty sure everyone on the planet knows that little ditty. You don't? Huh... Must have been living under a rock to miss those ads. 

Mega Chug is the drink that everyone seems to be raving about these days, and your trusty pal Pete? Yeah, he's got a WHOLE stash of the good stuff - so much so that the council's been on his back nonstop about those pesky plastic bottles he's been leaving around the place (poor guy, can't catch a break).

Anyway, somehow Lady Luck has shined upon ol' Pete and he's won yet ANOTHER lifetime supply of his favourite bevvy. Best help him on his way to the factory to make sure he gets there in one piece.

WASD = move
Space = jump
P = Pause
E = Interact with bottle
R = Drink

**NOTE: If you encounter a bug that prevents you from progressing the game, please pause and return to the main menu. You can then return to the same level via the Level Select.**
